author: Pavan Dahat
text:
Tribal activist and Aam Aadmi Party leader in Bastar, Soni Sori, was attacked by some unknown assailants in Dantewada district of Bastar late on Saturday evening.

“Two people attacked her near Bastanar village. It looks like an acid attack. Her face and eyes are burning. We took her to a hospital in Gidam town of Dantewada, but we were asked to take her to a Jagdalpur hospital,” Lingaram Kodopi, nephew of Soni Sori told The Hindu .
title: Soni Sori attacked
